intro: So you can use a telescope observing time booking is necessary. Thus, when the time comes, you will have the telescope just for you. Each owner sets the schedule availability of its telescopes. What we do is to provide intervals of 15 minutes during these hours.

solar.name: Solar experiment
solar.desc: Explore the Sun and its spots

three.p1: Once you have chosen your experiment and the telescope, the next step is to choose the specific day when you want to run it.
three.p2: With the intention that everyone can get time, the maximum number of reservations that you can accumulate are 2 within 7 days. We will be balancing this restriction as we go learning from you.
three.p3: Click on one of the days available to continue.

four.p1: To the left will appear timeslots that are available for the selected day. Click on one to see a summary of your reservation.
four.p2: If everything is correct, you just have to apply and wait for confirmation.
four.noslot: There is no time slot available for that day
four.notime: You have reached your maximum observing time
four.done: Your new reservation has been accepted. Check it
